++ Controller Area Network

[J1939]


CAN ID: This is a fundamental component of the CAN protocol and is used to address messages on the CAN bus.

Priority: This indicates the priority of the message relative to other messages on the bus. It is common in CAN communication but may have different interpretations in various CAN-based protocols.

DLC (Data Length Code): This specifies the length of the data payload in the message and is a standard component of CAN messages.
